4310940.name: Slide & Magic Demo
4310940.description:
Slide & Magic Demo

Move every object at once and puzzle your way through enchanted dungeons.

Help a quirky old wizard reclaim powerful crystals hidden across magical chambers. Each swipe sends every movable object sliding until it hits something - simple to learn, tricky to master. Inspired by Sokoban with a dash of 2048-style movement, Slide & Magic mixes strategic puzzles with a quirky magical twist.


A Sliding Puzzle With a Spellbound Twist

  • Slide all objects simultaneously and outwit chambers designed to challenge both logic and foresight.

  • Demo provides Two Ways to Play

    Campaign Mode - 40 levels handpicked stright from the full versions campaign.

    Endless Mode - Relax and slide through infinite, no-pressure puzzles.

For Casual Mages and Puzzle Archmages Alike

Whether you're here to unwind or to optimize every last move, Slide & Magic blends strategy, whimsy, and enchanted dungeon-delving across a variety of modes. Plan your moves, collect every crystal, and prove your magical might!

Grab your robe, adjust your beard, and start sliding.
The crystals won’t collect themselves!
